<title level="1" right="Rules">[Areas](/Rules.aspx?ID=2381)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 426 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Some effects occupy an area of a specified shape and size. An area effect always has a point of origin and extends out from that point. There are four types of areas: emanations, bursts, cones, and lines. See [Area](/Rules.aspx?ID=2384) for details.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
